lines.text: I'm ready now!
Uh, what's with the nurse's outfit?
I'm the angel of mercy, Tenchi.
[she laughs]

[Washu grabs Tenchi's underwear]
Aah! What are you doing?
I just need some sperm samples.
What? You're joking right? Stop it!
Don't woory. Strictly medical, right? Hello!
No!
I got magic fingers.
I don't care.
You want me to stop it?
That's what I just said!
Naah! You don't want me to stop it!
Yes! I do, too! Oh no!
Let's shake the dew off this lily, shall we?
[she reaches in Tenchi's underwear]
Excuse me.
Why? Why must I suffer from this kind of disgrace?

[Tenchi reaches the surface of the water, then he goes into shock, and turns]
Why are you being so shy? You seen me naked before, remember? In side the cave?
Yeah, I remember. But then you were just a mummy.
Curiosity kill the cat. Lucky for me, I'm not a cat!
[laughs]
There's no way out?
That's what I'm saying. You see on this diagram that this goes this way and this goes that way, and so, there's no way out. Absolutely not. No way. That's it. Got it?
Nope, I don't get it at all.
[Washu falls]
So, I guess what you mean is that there is absolutely no way out of here?
Where were you when they handed out the brains?

[grabbing Washu's leg, crying]
But how can this be? You created this ship, didn't you?
Mm-hmm.
[she gives the middle finger]
And that is why it is so perfect!
[Mihoshi falls]

[Mihoshi cries]
Okay, you pain in the neck. There only a couple of things that we can do here.

[Mihoshi stops crying. In front of her is a giant circle with Ryoko on it]
Ryoko! And what should I do now?
Take this and join in.
[She throws a fan at Mihoshi]
Hooray! Hooray! Ryoko! What's the matter?
[Mihoshi falls]

[Ryoko grabs Washu]
Okay, pipsqueak, whether my body is sagging or not is none of your business! What are visual psychological tactics anyway?
Your sex appeal, of course.
Hey, I'll have you know that my body shape hasn't changed in the past 700 years! What do you think of that, you big fat smart-alleck?
What I think is that's no way to talk to your mother, Ryoko.
Ehh?
That's right. Not did I only create you, but I created Ryo-oki, I created the Soja, I created so many things, really. But I used my ova for you. So I'm more like your mother than your creator.
You must be that female student that was kidnapped by Kagato.
A female student? No, I am Washu! And I happen to be the top scientific genius in the universe. I am cute. I have to admit, I look a little young, to be your mom, don't I, Ryoko?
Huh? Baloney! I've been around 2000 years! Ever since I was born! Ever since I was... I was born?
Huh?
[his leg is stuck]
Geez! I can't get it out!
And now I'm worried.
[Mihoshi and Ayeka fall]
Do something brilliant! You created this ship, didn't you?
She's right. There's gotta be something you haven't thought of.
Well, ok. There is just one more thing that we can try.
What is it?
We can pray real hard.
[Washu starts to pray. Mihoshi and Ayeka fall]
Hi, Tenchi!
[they walk towards him, but Ryoko trips them]
Hee hee! Too bad! I'm going to be the first person to give Tenchi a hug!
[she sees Ryo-oki on Tenchi. Ryoko falls]
Meaow! Meow!
[Ryoko snatches Ryo-oki]
I said I'm first!
Nice to meet you. My name is Washu. I would like to thank you for saving me from Kagato.
Oh... uh...
I like you. You wanna be a guinea pig for my experiment?

[Ryoko grabs Washu]
Listen, Mom!
[Sasami hugs Tenchi than everyone else goes and thanks Tenchi]
Shut up!
[the spaceship splits in half. Everyone gets confused]
I guess the spaceship was cut in half also.
Let's get out of here!
[the ship explodes]
Are you okay?
Uh, yeah. I'm fine. Uh, thank you, Sasami.
Because you look really pale, and your nose is bleeding.
[Tenchi covers his nose]
You're a naughty boy, are you, Tenchi
[Tenchi splashes Sasami with water]

[with his mouth covered]
No, it's not that, it's uh... I got dizzy, cause of the hot water.
Really?
Sorry for being naughty.

[patting Tenchi's head]
That's my boy.
No, unless...
Unless?
Unless you call me Little Washu!

[Ayeka falls]
Huh? Excuse me, Miss Washu?
No! I won't do anything unless you call me Little Washu!

[thinking]
How can I call you 'little' when you're over 20,000 years old?
[talking]
All right then, Little Washu. Can you do me a favor? Can you help me plant Ryu-oh?
Of course! I can do that! That's easy!
Of course! After all you're the number 1 scientic genius in the glaxay.
Of course, I'm the number 1 scientif genius in the universe!
[Washu laughs, then Ayeka luaghs]
But I'm not going to do it.
[Ayeka falls]
hat would be my standard answer, but for you I'm going to do it, because I really really like your enthusiasim.
Hey, don't you like your daddy better, little Princess Ayeka?
This is none of your business!
Hello, Masaki home. Oh, that sounds like if I were married to the family. How embarrassing. What do you think? Do you think it sounds that way?
Get a grip! And listen up detective!
[Ryoko makes deep breathes, than she makes her voice deep]
This is oyur very nasty superior at the Galaxy Police, Mihoshi.
Oh my! Hello. How did you know I was here?
Ah, unimportant detail. Now come on back and make your report.
Yes! Detective Mihoshi is on her way! You can count on me, sir!
Good!
[she hungs up and laughs]
Gulliable is an understatement!
Comics for girls? What is that?
What is that sound?
It sounds like Mihoshi's shuttle.

[Tenchi sits up pn his futon]
This can't be good.

[Ryoko walks towrd Tenchi, and hits him. They fall to the ground, and Ryoko gets up]
Oh, I'm sorry. Are you all right?
What? Ryoko, what's the idea?
I'm sorry. I wasn't paying attention. I'm so clumsy.

[Tenchi gets confuse]
My name is Ryoko, and I'm...
Huh?
Oh, embarrassed.

[to Sasami]
What are you doing?
Uh, Ayeka.
What? What is it?
Uh, can I ask you your name?
Huh? Ryoko, are you sick? I mean what's the matter?

[Ryoko pushes him]
Oh, Tenchi, you are a bold one, aren't you?
What's wrong with you?
Ryoko, your face is red. What's wrong? Do you have a cold?
Go away. I'm at the important part.
I got some great cold medicine.
I don't want it!
Sure you do. You have to take care of yourself.

[she starts to grab Ryoko]
The cure is to cure it early.
Let me go! Get your hands off me!
You're acting like a child!
Please stop! Let me go!
[they leave. Tenchi watches]
Are we done yet? Have you gotten anything? Sasami's got breakfast, you know.
I have all the samples I need for analysis. Ah! Except for the most important one.
I'm leaving!
Oh, Tenchi, please! It'll just be a minute. I only need to examine you a little bit.
But I have to go to the field now.
You promised you'll be my guinea pig, didn't you?
Now there's a conversation I don't recall.

[rubbing her head on Tenchi]
Tenchi, darling, please?
Um... maybe later when I get back. I gotta go, ok? Bye.
[Tenchi runs off]
Oh, you mean thing!

[Ryoko appears. She is about to grab Washu, but Tenchi comes back. Ryoko's face turns red]
Little Washu! Do you know where my gloves are?

[Tenchi's gloves appears in Washu's hands]
Oh! How'd they get here?
I knew it was you, Washu.
[Tenchi grabs his gloves and they both laugh]

[to Ryoko]
Oh, by the way, what are you doing here?
[Ryoko just stares at Tenchi]
Hello?
[she waves her hand in front of Ryoko's face]
Oh well.
[Washu and Tenchi leave]
Damn Washu. She won't follow into our hands very easily. Funny, she called that boy her guinea pig. Hmm...
